storyTitle: As Performance Manager, I want to set up review cycles to achieve timely evaluations of performance metrics

testCases.title: Validate successful setup of review cycles
preconditions: User is logged in as Performance Manager
Review cycle management feature is enabled

steps.action: Navigate to the review cycle management page
steps.expectedResult: Review cycle management interface is displayed with options to configure review cycles including frequency selection dropdown, save button, and any existing review cycles listed

steps.action: Select a frequency for review cycles from the dropdown (daily, weekly, or monthly)
steps.expectedResult: Selected frequency is displayed in the frequency field and highlighted as the current selection
Review cycle is saved successfully, confirmation message is displayed, and the new review cycle appears in the list of configured cycles

postconditions: Review cycle is stored in the database
Review cycle appears in the user's configured cycles list
System is ready to send reminders based on the configured frequency
User remains on the review cycle management page

testCases.title: Ensure reminders are sent for upcoming review cycles
preconditions: User is logged in as Performance Manager
Review cycle management feature is enabled

steps.action: Set up a review cycle with a defined frequency (e.g., daily or weekly)
steps.expectedResult: Review cycle is saved successfully and confirmation message is displayed

steps.action: Wait for the reminder time based on the configured frequency
steps.expectedResult: Reminder notification is sent to the user at the appropriate time before the scheduled review cycle

steps.action: Check notification for review cycle in the notification center or inbox
steps.expectedResult: Notification contains correct review cycle details including frequency, scheduled date/time, and relevant performance metrics to be reviewed

postconditions: Reminder notification has been delivered successfully
Notification is logged in the system
User is informed of the upcoming review

testCases.title: Verify error handling for incomplete review cycle setup
preconditions: User is logged in as Performance Manager
Review cycle management feature is enabled

steps.action: Navigate to the review cycle management page
steps.expectedResult: Review cycle management interface is displayed with frequency selection dropdown and save button visible

steps.action: Attempt to save a review cycle without selecting frequency by clicking the save button with frequency field empty
steps.expectedResult: Error message is displayed for missing frequency, indicating that frequency selection is required. The review cycle is not saved and the frequency field is highlighted or marked as required

steps.action: Select frequency from the dropdown (daily, weekly, or monthly) and click save button
steps.expectedResult: Review cycle is saved successfully, confirmation message is displayed, error message is cleared, and the new review cycle appears in the configured cycles list

postconditions: Review cycle is stored in the database after correction
No incomplete review cycles exist in the system
User receives appropriate feedback for both error and success states
